# Using OSmOSE for your bioacoustic workflows

OSmOSE is a toolkit aiming to provide a collection of tools and utilities to work with audio files in an acoustic research context. Built to work with the most common clusters and any platform, it can be used as an all-in-one software or as a python library. This guide will explain both method side by side.

```{toctree}
:maxdepth: 1

quickstart
```
